import React from 'react' import "./Content.css" import about from "../../assets/about.png"; import lisa from "../../assets/lisa.png"; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import 'react-tabs/style/react-tabs.css'; const Content = () => { return (

Well, What can you say about yourself?

Myself Education

I was born and raised in Durban, South Africa and have not crossed borders..yet. While in high school, I fell in love with the STEMs and discovered that solving math problems was actually more fun than beating King Of Fighters 2000's Final Boss (Good times though). Finished high school with my earned distinctions in Maths and Science and went off to varsity to study Pharmacy. You probably asking why Pharmacy - right? Well, the truth is I have no idea myself. I did Pharmacy till my final year but, before I could finish, I got seduced by programming. I then made the most important and biggest decision of my life, that affected not just me but everyone around me family, friends, foes - I bet even God farted a bit. Yes, I made a career pivot and pursued the world of programming and, between then and now, I will say I am very happy I made that decision.

WeThinkCode_

Yeah, yeah, whatever. Got any hobbies?

Gaming

I love playing fighting games like Mortal Kombat, Injustice Tekken and open world games such Watch dogs, Sleeping dogs, GTA, COD etc. I enjoy mainly fantasy, action and adventure genres - NO FIFA! I hate soccer/football period.

YouTubing?

I am not sure if I can call it a hobby but I have been posting some C# content to an anonymous channel - between me and you - it's actually called Fall3nWorldStudios. It not something I took seriously till people started to find it useful

 ) } export default Content
